verses.text: \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* the things \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w become|strong="G4241"\w* \w sound|strong="G5198"\w* \w doctrine|strong="G1319"\w*:

\w That|strong="G1511"\w* the aged \w men|strong="G4246"\w* \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w sober|strong="G3524"\w*, \w grave|strong="G4586"\w*, \w temperate|strong="G4998"\w*, \w sound|strong="G5198"\w* in \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, in \w charity|strong="G0026"\w*, in \w patience|strong="G5281"\w*.

The aged \w women|strong="G4247"\w* \w likewise|strong="G5615"\w*, \w that|strong="G3361"\w* \add they be\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w behaviour|strong="G2688"\w* as becometh \w holiness|strong="G2412"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* false \w accusers|strong="G1228"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w given|strong="G1402"\w* to \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w wine|strong="G3631"\w*, teachers of good \w things|strong="G2567"\w*;

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* they may \w teach|strong="G4994"\w* the young \w women|strong="G3501"\w* to be \w sober|strong="G4994"\w*, to love their \w husbands|strong="G5362"\w*, to love their \w children|strong="G5388"\w*,

\add To be\add* \w discreet|strong="G4998"\w*, \w chaste|strong="G0053"\w*, keepers at \w home|strong="G3626"\w*, \w good|strong="G0018"\w*, \w obedient|strong="G5293"\w* to their \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w husbands|strong="G0435"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w be|strong="G0987"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w blasphemed|strong="G0987"\w*.
Young \w men|strong="G3501"\w* \w likewise|strong="G5615"\w* \w exhort|strong="G3870"\w* to be sober \w minded|strong="G4993"\w*.

\w In|strong="G4012"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w shewing|strong="G3930"\w* \w thyself|strong="G4572"\w* a \w pattern|strong="G5179"\w* of \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*: \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w doctrine|strong="G1319"\w* \add shewing\add* \w uncorruptness|strong="G0090"\w*, \w gravity|strong="G4587"\w*, \w sincerity|strong="G0861"\w*,

\w Sound|strong="G5199"\w* \w speech|strong="G3056"\w*, that cannot be \w condemned|strong="G0176"\w*; \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he that \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the contrary \w part|strong="G1727"\w* may be \w ashamed|strong="G1788"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w no|strong="G3367"\w* evil \w thing|strong="G5337"\w* to \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*.

\add Exhort\add* \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* to \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w obedient|strong="G5293"\w* unto their \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w masters|strong="G1203"\w*, \add and\add* to \w please|strong="G2101"\w* \add them\add* \w well|strong="G2101"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add things\add*; \w not|strong="G3361"\w* answering \w again|strong="G0483"\w*;

\w Not|strong="G3361"\w* \w purloining|strong="G3557"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w shewing|strong="G1731"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w fidelity|strong="G4102"\w*; \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they may \w adorn|strong="G2885"\w* the \w doctrine|strong="G1319"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Saviour|strong="G4990"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* that \w bringeth|strong="G3588"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4992"\w* hath \w appeared|strong="G2014"\w* to \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*,

\w Teaching|strong="G3811"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w*, \w denying|strong="G0720"\w* \w ungodliness|strong="G0763"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w worldly|strong="G2886"\w* \w lusts|strong="G1939"\w*, we should \w live|strong="G2198"\w* \w soberly|strong="G4996"\w*, \w righteously|strong="G1346"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w godly|strong="G2153"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w present|strong="G3568"\w* \w world|strong="G0165"\w*;

Looking \w for|strong="G4327"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w blessed|strong="G3107"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w glorious|strong="G1391"\w* \w appearing|strong="G2015"\w* of the \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Saviour|strong="G4990"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*;

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he might \w redeem|strong="G3084"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w iniquity|strong="G0458"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w purify|strong="G2511"\w* unto \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* a \w peculiar|strong="G4041"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*, \w zealous|strong="G2207"\w* of \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*.

These \w things|strong="G5023"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w exhort|strong="G3870"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w rebuke|strong="G1651"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w authority|strong="G2003"\w*. \w Let|strong="G4065"\w* no \w man|strong="G3367"\w* \w despise|strong="G4065"\w* \w thee|strong="G4675"\w*.
